name: The Uverworld Project
description:
The Uverworld Project is a horror VN with inspiration from films like The Silence of the Lambs. Who was behind the murders in the Uverworld project? We shall see...

DISCLAIMER

The following is a heavy work in progress, and will be updated over time. We apologize for the rushed state that this demo is in. The Web build is currently unavailable due to lack of support in RPY8.

Synopsis

After the disappearance of two UCLA students, Santa Barbara PD Detective Neil Freeman and his assistant Freya launch an investigation into the Uverworld murders. The torture experiment left five victims dead and two injured, with some speculation of the convicted assassin Deranged Drew to be at the helm of the project.

Credits
